SELECT result.balance, result.directPetrolIncome, result.directVipIncome, result.indirectPetrolIncome, result.indirectVipIncome, ( result.directPetrolIncome + result.directVipIncome + result.indirectPetrolIncome + result.indirectVipIncome ) AS allCommissionIncome, result.withdrawed FROM ( SELECT sum(
IF ( income.is_settle = 0, income.first_vip_income + income.second_vip_income + income.first_petrol_income + income.second_petrol_income, 0 ) ) balance, sum(
IF ( income.is_settle = 1, income.first_vip_income + income.second_vip_income + income.first_petrol_income + income.second_petrol_income, 0 ) ) withdrawed, sum(income.first_petrol_income) AS directPetrolIncome, sum(income.first_vip_income) AS directVipIncome, sum( income.second_petrol_income ) AS indirectPetrolIncome, sum(income.second_vip_income) AS indirectVipIncome FROM czb_partner_vip_income income WHERE income.partner_id = #{userId} ) AS result

SELECT count(IF(partner = 1, 1, NULL)) AS partnerCount, count(IF(vip = 1, 1, NULL)) AS ordinaryUserCount, count(
IF ( vip = 1 AND ( secondLevel = '' OR secondLevel IS NULL ), 1, NULL ) ) AS directVipCount, count(
IF ( vip = 1 AND ( secondLevel != '' AND secondLevel IS NOT NULL ), 1, NULL ) ) AS indirectVipCount FROM ( SELECT users.user_id userId, users.is_vip vip, users.partner, users.second_level_partner secondLevel FROM czb_user users WHERE first_level_partner = #{userId} ) AS allUser

SELECT COALESCE(sum(
IF ( result.partnerLevel = 1 AND result.is_settlement = 1, result.amount, 0 ) ), 0) direct, COALESCE(sum(
IF ( result.partnerLevel = 2 AND result.is_settlement = 1, result.amount, 0 ) ),0) indirect, COALESCE(sum(
IF ( result.partnerLevel = 0 AND result.is_settlement = 0 AND result.remark = '充值vip返佣', result.amount, 0 ) ), 0) directVip FROM ( SELECT log.amount amount, log.partner_commission_level partnerLevel, log.is_settlement, log.remark FROM ( SELECT info_id infoId FROM czb_user_income_info info WHERE info.user_id = #{userId} ) AS infoIdResult LEFT JOIN czb_income_log log ON log.info_id = infoIdResult.infoId WHERE log.create_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND amount != 0 ) AS result

SELECT sum(
IF ( result.partnerLevel = 0 AND result.is_settlement = 0 AND result.remark = '充值vip返佣', result.amount, 0 ) ) directVip FROM ( SELECT log.amount amount, log.partner_commission_level partnerLevel, log.is_settlement, log.remark FROM ( SELECT info_id infoId FROM czb_user_income_info info WHERE info.user_id = #{userId} ) AS infoIdResult LEFT JOIN czb_income_log log ON log.info_id = infoIdResult.infoId WHERE amount != 0 ) AS result

select sum(case when first_level_partner = superior_user and create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 0 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then 1 else 0 end) as firstDirectNumber, sum( case when first_level_partner != superior_user and create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 0 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then 1 else 0 end) as firstIndirectNumber, sum(case when first_level_partner = superior_user and create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then 1 else 0 end) as secondDirectNumber, sum( case when first_level_partner != superior_user and create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then 1 else 0 end) as secondIndirectNumber, sum(case when first_level_partner = superior_user and create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 2 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then 1 else 0 end) as thirdDirectNumber, sum( case when first_level_partner != superior_user and create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 2 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then 1 else 0 end) as thirdIndirectNumber from czb_user where first_level_partner = #{userId}
